item.description:

item.title: shoudl i do it?
item.dc:creator: OldDirtyBastard
item.description:
I couldn’t resist. Blame the thread name.

Anyway, yes and no. If you are obsessed book collector and crazy HL fan (and you have no better way to spend 10 bucks) - no brainer.
Otherwise, you would just want to get a pdf.

And take notice, although the current bid is a bargain, don’t expect it to stay that way.

Read full topic
